# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than $80 to you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I kindly propose a price of $95 for this product. This offer includes a limited-time discount, ensuring you receive the best value possible. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
